name: Usualwines
0:
”Alexa, open usual wines”
”Alexa, ask usual wines to find me some wine”
”Alexa, ask usual wines what is my order status”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: usual wines
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A large glass of real wine, by the bottle. You can order wine of your choice using Alexa device. 

This skill uses Account linking to connect with your Usual Wines account.

PRIVACY INFORMATION
This skill uses your https://usualwines.com account to manage your profile. The privacy for this skill is determined by the Usual Wines Privacy Policy https://usualwines.com/pages/privacy

Shipping couriers require an in-person, adult signature of someone 21 years of age or older at the time of delivery. Shipping couriers require a government issued form of ID at the time of delivery to verify age.

Our wines are made in small, sustainably farmed batches with no additives. The grapes are curated from the healthiest, tastiest crops each season, so once they hit the barrels, we let them do their thing with minimal intervention - no added sugars, no added sulfites - the natural way.

To open this skill
"Alexa, open Usual Wines"
followed by
- find me some red wine
- what is my order status
- help
